WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-EAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 22 JAN
   BY M/V HAI YANG SHI YOU 720 TOWING TEN
   12000 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   20-36S 039-25W, 20-41S 038-53W,
   20-27S 038-50W, 20-22S 039-23W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 23 JAN 21.
